component.summary: Chromium built with all freeworld codecs and VA-API support

description.p: Chromium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way to experience the web.
We invite you to join our effort to build a powerful platform for developing a new generation of web applications.
This package comes with all freeworld codecs and VA-API support enabled.
